full_sentence: It may be possible that Bloomberg holds more racial animosity towards blacks than even trump. Neither of these men would have a chance in a sane world.

Only for people who actually give a fuck about that. Which isn't as many as you might guess. I'm a mood-hound, atmosphere may be the very most important thing to me in games (and most other media too), but I'm always surprised by just how many people genuinely just aren't even attuned to that kind of thing
